scripts.test-markdown: rm -rf test/test-run && mkdir test/test-run && cd test/test-run && $INIT_CWD/bin/elmstatic.js init && $INIT_CWD/bin/elmstatic.js build
scripts.test-elm-markup: rm -rf test/test-run && mkdir test/test-run && cd test/test-run && $INIT_CWD/bin/elmstatic.js init --elm-markup && $INIT_CWD/bin/elmstatic.js build
scripts.test: npm run test-markdown && npm run test-elm-markup
